doc.field: K'at'eey tsät įįttheel de' k'at'eey tuu shyiit tatagntth'äl.
K'at'eey tsät įįttheel de' k'at'eey tuu shyiit tatagntth'äl.
If you had not cut wood, then I would not have fallen into the water.
